divs: sighting detailsi was excersize walking w\my mom down the street at 10:25pm we noticed a glowing ball, orange in color heading west in a strait line at what appeared to me as approx 80 miles per hour. it made no noise and was bright orange in color, but easy to look at. it had no blinking lights on it as it traveled across the sky. it disappeared behind the trees and out of our sight.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Saginaw
There were no other sightings in Saginaw on or around September 6th 2008
Summary: bright orange glowing ball or orb. Easy to look at. apprx 1000' in the air. traveling West at 80 MPH.
